title: (x) Hellmann's menu font - Clearface Gothic {Andreas}
content:
Could anyone identify the font that was used on [http://hellmanns.ca/en/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122183730/http:/hellmanns.ca/en/ "http://hellmanns.ca/en/")  
I am talking about the menu font, for example : Recipes, Products, Contest & Events.

thanks so much in advance  
cheers  
Freddy
author: fsamuel

comments.content: you are the man.... thanks so much :D
